text.autoconfig.shutter.title: Shutter Configuration
config.shutter.notificationTarget.@Toolt: Determines where and how notifications are displayed.
config.shutter.genSettings.@Tooltip: Settings regarding the generation, following and properties of camera paths.
config.shutter.genSettings.pathTime.@Too: The default time the path takes to complete. Overwritten by the start command. In ticks.
config.shutter.genSettings.curveDetail.@: The detail level of the curve interpolation for generated paths.
config.shutter.genSettings.hideArmorStan: Whether or not to show Armor Stands translucently during path following.
config.shutter.pathSettings.@Tooltip: Settings regarding the Camera Path Visualization.
config.shutter.pathSettings.showNodeHead: Set whether or not to render a camera head object at nodes, indicating their rotation and position.
config.shutter.pathSettings.nodeTranspar: Set the transparency of Path Nodes.
config.shutter.pathSettings.showDirectio: Set whether or not to render a additional line with Path Nodes, indicating direction.
config.shutter.pathSettings.pathStyle.@T: Set the style in which the path between nodes is rendered during visualization.
config.shutter.pathSettings.pathColour.@: Set the colour in which the path between nodes is rendered during visualization.
msg.shutter.error.not_enough_start: At least 2 nodes are required to start the path!
msg.shutter.error.not_enough_show: At least 2 nodes are required to visualize the path!
msg.shutter.error.go_to_node: Unable to go to Node #%d; Out of Bounds!
msg.shutter.error.set_node: Unable to replace Node #%d; Out of Bounds!
msg.shutter.error.remove_node: Unable to remove Node #%d; Out of Bounds!
